DOC.brief_title: Study OsseoSpeed™ TX Narrow Implants Upper Jaw Chinese Population
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . Aged 2075 year enrollment 3 . History edentulism study area least two month 4 . Neighboring tooth/teeth plan crown ( ) must natural root ( ) 5 . Presence natural teeth , partial prosthesis and/or implant opposite jaw contact plan crown 6 . Deemed investigator bone height width suitable 3.0 mm diameter study implant 7 . Deemed investigator likely present initially stable implant situation 1 . Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator 2 . Uncontrolled pathologic process oral cavity 3 . Known suspected current malignancy 4 . History radiation therapy head neck region 5 . History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery 6 . Systemic local disease condition could compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration , deem investigator 7 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus 8 . Corticosteroids medication could influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration 9 . Smoking 10 cigarette per day 10 . Present alcohol and/or drug abuse 11 . Involvement plan conduct study ( applies Astra Tech staff staff study site ) 12 . Previous enrollment present study 13 . Simultaneous participation another clinical study , participation clinical study last week prior enrollment
